testcase.name: Add a menu item
testcase.system-out: Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" and price 15..........passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then Menu Item with name "Chicken Sandwich" should be added.................passed Given I have a menu item with name "Cucumber Sandwich" and price $20........passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then Menu Item with name "Cucumber Sandwich" should be added................passed

testcase.name: Add another menu item
testcase.system-out: Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" and price 15..........passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then Menu Item with name "Chicken Sandwich" should be added.................passed Given I have a menu item with name "Cucumber Salad" and price 15............passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then Menu Item with name "Cucumber Salad" should be added...................passed

testcase.name: Add third menu item
testcase.system-out: Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" and price 15..........passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then Menu Item with name "Chicken Sandwich" should be added.................passed Given I have a menu item with name "Chicken Sandwich" and price 15..........passed When I add that menu item...................................................passed Then I should see an error message with value "Duplicate Item"..............passed
